front.title: Transferring MIB Work from IETF Ethernet Interfaces and Hub MIB WG to IEEE 802.3 WG

abstract.t: This document records the transfer of ownership of the Ethernet- related MIB modules DOT3-OAM-MIB, SNMP-REPEATER-MIB, POWER-ETHERNET- MIB, DOT3-EPON-MIB, EtherLike-MIB, EFM-CU-MIB, ETHER-WIS and MAU-MIB from the IETF to the IEEE 802.3 Working Group. This document also describes the procedures associated with the transfer, relying heavily on RFC 4663 (which records an earlier transfer to the IEEE 802.1 Working Group) as the primary source.
